content: If logging has been running for a long time, it is possible for the log to have grown too large to be displayed. In that case, delete "filterlog.html" in the account's subfolder of "ImapMail" in your Thunderbird profile.
creator: wsmwk

content: You continue to post the same question in new threads instead of continuing with an initial one. I think this is your fourth post. If you keep responses, you won't need to continue asking. @sfhowes responded to you on your first post. The info you seek is at https://www.xfinity.com/support/articles/third-party-email-access
